sanitation

We understand the importance of maintaining a healthy, safe environment for all of our valued guests. That is why we clean, sanitize and disinfect all of our surfaces, instruments and equipment after each services. We pledge to adhere to the highest industry standards.

BOLD AND CONFIDENT

STUNNING LASHES

We create the perfect lash illusion for your eye shape. Our professional lash artists will guide you every step of the way.

MICROBLADING PERFECTION

There are a dizzying number of brow products and services at our disposal aimed to get us lush and thick brows. But two techniques are taking the beauty industry by storm:

(1) Microblading | The process of tattooing tiny brow hairs with a needle.

(2) Powder Brows Shading | The process of using a permanent makeup device to give the brow its fullness.

TOUR OUR SALONS

Ambiance presents state-of-the-art salons that utilizes luxurious designs and equipment. We are furnished with luxurious pedicure chairs, elegant manicure tables, wax/skin care room and most of our salons even have a full bar!

best of cincinnati

We are staffed by the best technicians in all of Cincinnati. Our team is made up of hundreds of hand-selected technicians with the talents and experience to ensure our guests receive the very best in nail and skin care.
